main event: A military observer reported seeing a bright, greenish-white object the size of a pinhead held at arm's length, moving rapidly across the sky in an easterly direction.
interesting points: The object was first observed at an elevation of 30 degrees and an azimuth of 162 degrees, and it disappeared at an elevation of 13 degrees and an azimuth of 145 degrees, appearing to follow an orbital path.
The object was observed visually without optical aids by the crew of an aircraft at an altitude of 6,000 feet and a position of 62°30'N 083°20'W.
The object was evaluated as a possible satellite.

A separate report describes a UFO sighting in Toscan, Italy, where a man named Mario Zuccala witnessed a saucer-shaped object about 30 meters in diameter, emitting a brilliant white light and moving rapidly with a hazy, luminous field around it.
The report includes diagrams or sketches depicting the UFO as described by Zuccala.
sighted object: a bright, greenish-white object the size of a pinhead held at arm's length
